mapper.insert:
insert into welding_info
welding_info.direction,
welding_info.hole_num,
welding_info.inner_glancing_flatness,
welding_info.is_delete,
welding_info.line_id,
welding_info.miles,
welding_info.operator,
welding_info.position,
welding_info.position_category,
welding_info.reinforce_welding,
welding_info.remark,
welding_info.side,
welding_info.station_id,
welding_info.status,
welding_info.thigh_track_id,
welding_info.thign_track_category,
welding_info.track_glancing_flatness,
welding_info.track_id,
welding_info.turnout_id,
welding_info.turnout_thign_category,
welding_info.weld_date,
welding_info.weld_track_temperature,
welding_info.weld_user,
welding_info.welder_unit,
welding_info.welding_no,
welding_info.welding_type,
welding_info.welding_way,
welding_info.workarea_id,
welding_info.create_time
values
#{direction},
#{holeNum},
#{innerGlancingFlatness},
#{isDelete},
#{lineId},
#{miles},
#{operator},
#{position},
#{positionCategory},
#{reinforceWelding},
#{remark},
#{side},
#{stationId},
#{status},
#{thighTrackId},
#{thignTrackCategory},
#{trackGlancingFlatness},
#{trackId},
#{turnoutId},
#{turnoutThignCategory},
#{weldDate},
#{weldTrackTemperature},
#{weldUser},
#{welderUnit},
#{weldingNo},
#{weldingType},
#{weldingWay},
#{workareaId},
current_timestamp
mapper.update:
update welding_info
welding_info.direction = #{Direction},
welding_info.hole_num = #{HoleNum},
welding_info.inner_glancing_flatness = #{InnerGlancingFlatness},
welding_info.is_delete = #{IsDelete},
welding_info.line_id = #{LineId},
welding_info.miles = #{Miles},
welding_info.operator = #{Operator},
welding_info.position = #{Position},
welding_info.position_category = #{PositionCategory},
welding_info.reinforce_welding = #{ReinforceWelding},
welding_info.remark = #{Remark},
welding_info.side = #{Side},
welding_info.station_id = #{StationId},
welding_info.status = #{Status},
welding_info.thigh_track_id = #{ThighTrackId},
welding_info.thign_track_category = #{ThignTrackCategory},
welding_info.track_glancing_flatness = #{TrackGlancingFlatness},
welding_info.track_id = #{TrackId},
welding_info.turnout_id = #{TurnoutId},
welding_info.turnout_thign_category = #{TurnoutThignCategory},
welding_info.weld_date = #{WeldDate},
welding_info.weld_track_temperature = #{WeldTrackTemperature},
welding_info.weld_user = #{WeldUser},
welding_info.welder_unit = #{WelderUnit},
welding_info.welding_no = #{WeldingNo},
welding_info.welding_type = #{WeldingType},
welding_info.welding_way = #{WeldingWay},
welding_info.workarea_id = #{WorkareaId}
welding_info.update_time= current_timestamp
welding_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select welding_info.create_time, welding_info.direction, welding_info.hole_num, welding_info.id, welding_info.inner_glancing_flatness, welding_info.is_delete, welding_info.line_id, welding_info.miles, welding_info.operator, welding_info.position, welding_info.position_category, welding_info.reinforce_welding, welding_info.remark, welding_info.side, welding_info.station_id, welding_info.status, welding_info.thigh_track_id, welding_info.thign_track_category, welding_info.track_glancing_flatness, welding_info.track_id, welding_info.turnout_id, welding_info.turnout_thign_category, welding_info.update_time, welding_info.weld_date, welding_info.weld_track_temperature, welding_info.weld_user, welding_info.welder_unit, welding_info.welding_no, welding_info.welding_type, welding_info.welding_way, welding_info.workarea_id form welding_info
welding_info.id = #{id}
